item.description: About This is the part where I do some self-justification, and explain something about me. Work I’m middle management at a tech company. This blog is run by Hugo powered  •  Theme by Beautiful Jekyll adapted to Beautiful Hugo

item.title: A Trip to the Living Computer Museum
item.description: in Seattle… One of the neat things about living in Seattle is that Seattle has quite a lot of retired philanthropic bazillionaires about the town. One of those bazillionaires is Paul Allen ( $MSFT co-founder ). He’s founded a handful of museums and other things around town, including Living Computers museum + labs. Well, I got the chance to go there this evening ( FREE from 5:00-8:00pm on First Thursdays ).
